summary: This is a Verified Inventory filed in the probate proceedings for the Estate of Jeffrey E. Epstein in the Superior Court of the Virgin Islands. It details the extensive personal property and assets of the estate, including cash, vehicles, LLCs, corporations, and real estate holdings, with a total personal property value of over $636 million. The document includes verifications by the estate administrators and certificates of service to various attorneys. This document is a compilation of financial and corporate records related to Jeffrey Epstein and his entities, including bank account statements, vehicle title documents, and numerous LLC operating agreements and annual filings from the U.S. Virgin Islands and New York. It shows the management and ownership structure of multiple Epstein-linked companies, often with Epstein as the sole member and Erika Kellerhals acting as attorney-in-fact. This document is a compilation of corporate filings, tax records, and property documents for various entities associated with Jeffrey Epstein in the US Virgin Islands and other locations. It includes annual reports, franchise tax filings, property tax bills, and corporate agreements, revealing the structure and financial details of Epstein's network of companies and trusts.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Appears as the sole member and owner of numerous limited liability companies (LLCs) based in the U.S. Virgin Islands and New York, with addresses in St. Thomas, VI and Palm Beach, FL. Also listed on bank accounts and vehicle titles.

persons.name: Christopher Allen
persons.context: An attorney (Esq.) listed as a signatory on the inventory document, representing the estate.

persons.context: Verified the inventory, stating it is true and accurate to the best of his knowledge. He is a key administrator of the estate.

persons.name: Erika Kellerhals
persons.context: Signed multiple corporate filings (annual reports, income statements) as Attorney in Fact on behalf of Jeffrey Epstein for entities including Poplar Inc., Laurel Inc., Maple Inc., Cypress Inc., Nautilus Inc., and Southern Trust Company Inc.

persons.name: Larry Visoski
persons.context: Listed as the Manager for FREEDOM AIR PETROLEUM, LLC, with a physical address in Charlotte Amalie, USVI.

persons.name: Gregory R. Francis
persons.role: Lieutenant Governor of the Virgin Islands
persons.context: Certified the name change of LSJ EMPLOYEES, LLC to LSJE, LLC in 2013 in his official capacity.

persons.name: Nadine Voisin
persons.context: Addressed in a French notarial letter regarding the estate account of Jeffrey Epstein (referred to as 'JEP'), concerning the sale of a Mercedes.

persons.name: Sophie Guerin Tournier
persons.context: Signed a letter from the French notarial firm NENERT ET ASSOCIES to attorney Nadine Voisin, transmitting the account statement for the 'SUCCESSION JEP' (Epstein's estate) and confirming the deposit of funds from a car sale.

persons.name: Laura Curran
persons.context: Mentioned in a Nassau County property assessment notice as having reversed a prior administration's decision regarding mailing assessment notices.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed as president, grantor, trustee, or member for multiple corporate entities (Poplar Inc., Laurel Inc., Maple Inc., Cypress Inc., Nautilus Inc., Southern Trust Company Inc., IGY-AYH St.Thomas Holdings LLC) and as the grantor/trustee of The Haze Trust.

persons.name: Darren Indyke
persons.context: Listed as Secretary for Poplar Inc., Maple Inc., Cypress Inc., Nautilus Inc., and Southern Trust Company Inc., and as Vice-president, Secretary for Laurel Inc.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Listed as Treasurer for Poplar Inc., Laurel Inc., Maple Inc., Cypress Inc., Nautilus Inc., and Southern Trust Company Inc. Also referenced in an email regarding property valuation.

persons.name: Mark Lande
persons.context: Signed as Entity Representative for Island Global Yachting Facilities LTD in the IGY-AYH St.Thomas Holdings, LLC annual report filing.

persons.name: F.-M. Pichard
persons.context: Author of an email to 'Richard' (likely Richard Kahn) concerning a property evaluation proposal for an apartment at 22 avenue Foch.

Kahn is an administrator verifying the inventory of Epstein's estate.

Allen is an attorney representing Epstein's estate.

D'Andrade is an attorney representing Epstein's estate.
Indyke is listed as the organizer and registered agent for LYN AND JOJO LLC, an entity associated with Epstein's address. He also appears on a bank statement address for Epstein.
Kellerhals acted as 'Attorney in Fact' for Epstein, signing numerous annual corporate filings for his USVI LLCs on his behalf.
Visoski is listed as the Manager of FREEDOM AIR PETROLEUM, LLC, for which Epstein is a Member.
Guerin Tournier, a notary, corresponded with attorney Nadine Voisin regarding the financial account for Epstein's estate (SUCCESSION JEP).
Voisin is an attorney with Hughes Hubbard & Reed LLP in Paris, corresponding with French notaries about Epstein's estate account, suggesting a legal representation role.
Epstein is President and Indyke is Secretary/Vice-president for multiple corporate entities, indicating a professional corporate officer relationship.
Epstein is President and Kahn is Treasurer for multiple corporate entities, indicating a professional corporate officer relationship.
Kellerhals acts as Attorney in Fact, signing official corporate documents on behalf of Epstein for several entities.
Both are involved with IGY-AYH St.Thomas Holdings, LLC, with Epstein as a member and Lande as the representative for another member entity.
Pichard sent an email to 'Richard' (likely Kahn) regarding a property valuation, indicating a business or professional communication.
Southern Trust Company Inc. is listed as a 50% member of Prytanee, LLC according to an operating agreement exhibit.

events.title: Death of Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein died, leading to the opening of probate proceedings for his estate.

events.title: Transfer of Personal Funds to Estate
events.description: The entirety of Epstein's personal account, $8,554,622.64, was transferred into the Estate's checking account.

events.title: Asset Value Snapshot
events.description: The inventory provides values of estate assets as of this date, with a total personal property value of $636,132,058.00.

events.title: Filing of Verified Inventory
events.description: The Verified Inventory of Epstein's estate was filed with the Superior Court of the Virgin Islands.

events.title: LSJ EMPLOYEES, LLC Name Change
events.description: LSJ EMPLOYEES, LLC filed Articles of Amendment to change its name to LSJE, LLC. Certified by Lt. Gov. Gregory R. Francis.

events.title: French Notary Letter on Epstein Estate
events.description: Notary Sophie Guerin Tournier sent a letter to attorney Nadine Voisin enclosing the account statement for the 'SUCCESSION JEP' (Jeffrey Epstein's estate), confirming deposit of funds from a Mercedes sale.

events.title: Multiple LLC Annual Filings
events.description: A series of annual report filings were submitted for numerous Epstein-linked USVI LLCs (e.g., FREEDOM AIR PETROLEUM, MICHELLE'S TRANSPORTATION, ZORRO MANAGEMENT, etc.), all signed by Erika Kellerhals as Attorney in Fact.

events.title: Vehicle Title Transfer
events.description: A Florida certificate of title shows transfer of a vehicle to Jeffrey E. Epstein at his Palm Beach address.

events.title: Creation of The Haze Trust
events.description: Trust agreement dated 1991 between Jeffrey E. Epstein as Grantor and Jeffrey E. Epstein as Trustee.

events.title: Prytanee LLC Operating Agreement
events.description: Operating agreement made for Prytanee, LLC, involving Southern Trust Company Inc. as a member.

events.title: Property Valuation Inquiry
events.description: Email from F.-M. Pichard to 'Richard' concerning a valuation proposal for an apartment at 22 avenue Foch in Paris.

events.title: Batch of Corporate Filings
events.description: Multiple USVI corporate annual reports and franchise tax filings were signed and filed by Epstein, Kahn, and Kellerhals for various entities.

events.title: Additional Corporate Filings
events.description: Further USVI corporate annual reports and franchise tax filings were filed for entities including Poplar Inc., Laurel Inc., and Maple Inc.

keyFacts: The total personal property value of Jeffrey Epstein's estate was $636,132,058.00 as of the inventory date.
The estate held significant real estate through LLCs and corporations, including properties in New York City, Palm Beach, New Mexico, Paris, and private islands in the Virgin Islands.
Key assets included a Gulfstream G-550 aircraft ($17M), two helicopters ($4.2M), and numerous corporate entities like Southern Trust Company, Inc. ($233.6M) and Southern Financial, LLC ($176.96M).
The estate administrators were Darren K. Indyke and Richard D. Kahn, who verified the inventory's accuracy.
The document reveals the complex corporate structure Epstein used to hold his assets, involving over 30 LLCs, corporations, and trusts.
Jeffrey Epstein was the sole member of at least ten different LLCs registered in the U.S. Virgin Islands and New York, many formed with a nominal $1,000 capital contribution.
Erika Kellerhals repeatedly acted as 'Attorney in Fact' for Epstein, signing annual corporate filings for his USVI LLCs in July 2019, after Epstein's arrest and before his death.
A French notarial firm (NENERT ET ASSOCIES) managed a bank account for 'SUCCESSION JEP' (Epstein's estate), holding proceeds from the sale of a Mercedes, indicating posthumous asset management.
Epstein's corporate network used consistent addresses: 6100 Red Hook Quarter in St. Thomas, VI for ownership and 9053 Estate Thomas in Charlotte Amalie, VI for business mailing/management.
Darren K. Indyke, an attorney, was the organizer and registered agent for LYN AND JOJO LLC, a New York entity, linking him to Epstein's corporate structure.

Jeffrey Epstein was the president and controlling figure for a network of at least seven USVI corporations (Poplar, Laurel, Maple, Cypress, Nautilus, Southern Trust Company, IGY-AYH St.Thomas Holdings LLC) as of 2019.
Darren Indyke and Richard Kahn served consistently as Secretary and Treasurer, respectively, across multiple Epstein-associated entities, indicating their key roles in the corporate structure.
Attorney Erika Kellerhals acted as Attorney in Fact, signing numerous official financial filings on behalf of Jeffrey Epstein in July and September 2019.
Southern Trust Company Inc., an Epstein entity, held a 50% membership interest in Prytanee, LLC, as per a 2016 operating agreement.
The documents show significant property holdings, including a New York City property (9 East 71st Street) assessed at over $50 million and a Palm Beach property with a 2019 tax bill over $233,000.
